1650910.name: Sisterhood
1650910.description:
Embark on the exciting adventure in a unique blend of story-driven and third-person adventure game set in an alternate universe dominated by church and its sisters.

THE STORY

Sisterhood is one of many church congregations.
You play as one of the sisters, involved in special operations.
Complete missions, rescue sisters from troubles, gain their affection and unlock interactions.

MAGIC ESSENCE

Magic essence that can be harvested from demonic activity and used for healing.

CORRUPTION

Demonic activity causes corruption which is toxic for all humans, however sisters armor has powerful protection against corruption.

SUMMON

Sisters have the ability to summon fellow sisters and creatures to help them on their mission.

FEATURES

  • Character Customization Options
  • Interactions with fellow sisters - gaining their affection and unlocking interactions.
  • Environment with dynamic weather, daytime and the world itself.
  • Story-driven adventure with combat and exploration

Sisterhood is built around weapons and precision in using them. Finding enemy weak spots plays a vital role in successful combat and achieving ultimate victory.

Fighting mechanics aimed at precision in landing headshots in crucial to your survival

Multiple world bosses and gameplay aimed at finding enemy weakness, designed to be challenging and rewarding.
